item.title: 11 Elected Officials Arrested While Trying to Access Cells at N.Y.C. ICE Facility
item.description: Brad Lander, the city comptroller, was arrested again. Jumaane D. Williams, the public advocate, was among protesters detained outside.

item.title: At U.K. Leader’s Country House, Trump’s State Visit Gets a Little More Political
item.description: Photographs of the pomp and spectacle of the U.S. president’s second state visit to Britain.

item.title: What Jimmy Kimmel’s Suspension Says About the Trump Administration’s Crackdown Against Mainstream Media
item.description: ABC’s decision to “indefinitely” suspend Jimmy Kimmel’s late-night talk show illuminates the administration’s efficacy so far.

item.title: In Their Own Words: Trump and Top Officials Change Tone on Free Speech
item.description: In the wake of Charlie Kirk’s assassination, the president’s pledges to guarantee free speech have been replaced by efforts to suppress — and even cri...

item.title: The Era of Dark Passions
item.description: Leaders across the political spectrum have figured out how easily they can motivate people with anger, fear and domination.
